message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $175. It's a great deal, and I'm confident you'll find it very useful. What do you think?
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $120. I'm willing to pay a premium for the product, but I'm not sure I'm willing to go all the way to $175.
Bob, I understand you're looking for a good deal, but $120 just isn't going to work for me. How about we meet in the middle at $140?  That's still a fair price for both of us.
I appreciate your willingness to meet in the middle, but I'm still a bit hesitant to go up to $140. How about we try $130? I'm willing to compromise, but I need to stay within my budget.
